text: Alright thank you! The notepad should be great :slightly_smiling_face: and yes, thinking about my answer and structuring it first sounds good

That's interesting wow, my art teacher was telling me about how her friend did some course but ended up going into graphic design because he was just good at it and had a passion for it! And that's so cool, your sister told you to do the right thing :smile: you're so helpful and excellent at doing your job!!

My friends always tell me to write children's books and do my own illustrations if nothing works out for me when I'm older, so if I have nothing sorted and I'm feeling confused I could have a look into that haha :slightly_smiling_face:

Also, yesterday I got an email from my last option telling me that they'd like to have an interview or see my portfolio on the 15 Feb, but it clashes with my Kingston interview so I'm going to have to let them know and re-arrange it.
I've heard back from all my universities now
